p: Demand for TCM continues to grow in the Western world. Application of modern disciplines in TCM has resulted in the isolation and identification of novel and/or active compounds. Some of these were developed to produce new drugs for the treatment of important diseases such as malaria, vascular diseases and cancer which is deemed necessary to improve the quality of TCM materials. However, a majority of TCM has not been elucidated chemically and pharmacologically and most of the TCM-derived compounds were found not to be as active as the original TCM preparation. This points to the possibilities of synergism being involved [ 48]. Herbal formulation that contains two or more herbs in specific proportions have been used to treat a variety of symptoms in a wide range of diseases, such as forgetfulness, disorientation, insomnia, unconsciousness, cramps and seizures [ 54].
